function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contagious diseases propagation due to crowded indoor environments such as casinos","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases within the casino premises and to the larger community","Mitigation":"Enforcement of strict sanitation, hygiene, and social distancing measures within the casino","Technologies":"Air purification systems, contactless technologies for transactions, and crowd monitoring technologies","People":"Casino staff, casino patrons, and the surrounding community","Owner":"Casino management and regulatory authorities"},{"Description":"Normative pressure leading to potential neglect of health and safety regulations","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission due to non-compliance with health and safety measures","Mitigation":"Training and education on health and safety regulations, regular monitoring and enforcement of compliance","Technologies":"Digital training platforms, health monitoring technologies, and compliance tracking systems","People":"Employees in the service industry","Owner":"Employers and regulatory authorities"},{"Description":"Mimicking of social norms leading to potential disregard for health and safety measures","Impact":"Risk of contagious disease transmission due to imitation of behaviors that compromise health and safety","Mitigation":"Promotion of positive social norms around health and safety, education on the importance of following health guidelines","Technologies":"Social media campaigns, educational apps, and community engagement platforms","People":"General public and individuals in close social circles","Owner":"Public health authorities and community leaders"}]}
